availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William J. Carlyle (Taylor and Woodford cos, KY, laborer)

body.p: Woodford County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Joseph Carlyle and Cassa Carlile. Married to Evaline Poulter Carlyle in Jefferson County on January 14, 1858. Father of William Hallie Carlisle. Laborer in Taylor County in 1850. Signed a petition as a Woodford County resident in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor County, Division 2, p.12.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000819608, p. 50.
KYR-0001-020-1411.
